题目:
The table is made of ______.
A. the wood
B. woods
C. wood
D. the woods
提示: 物质名词前不用冠词（零冠词）。

题目:
A beautiful girl is playing ______ on the stage.
A. the violin
B. violin
C. a violin
D. violins
提示: 演奏乐器前须加定冠词 the。

题目:
Liu Dandan is ______ Chinese student. Nancy is ______ English student.
A. a; a
B. an; an
C. a; an
D. an; a
提示: a 用于辅音音素开头的词（Chinese），an 用于元音音素开头的词（English）。

题目:
They have never seen ______ interesting film.
A. such
B. such an
C. so
D. such a
提示: interesting 以元音音素开头，需用 an。

题目:
—When do you usually have ______ supper?
—At six o'clock.
A. a
B. an
C. the
D. /
提示: 三餐名称前不加冠词。

题目:
—Do you know ______ woman in red?
—She is a teacher.
A. the
B. a
C. an
D. /
提示: 特指“穿红衣服的妇女”，用定冠词 the。

题目:
The Everest is ______ highest mountain in the world.
A. a
B. an
C. the
D. /
提示: 最高级前加定冠词 the。

题目:
He hit the bad man on ______ nose.
A. the
B. a
C. an
D. his
提示: 打某人的身体部位时，部位前加 the。

题目:
We'll go to the supermarket by ______ bus.
A. the
B. a
C. /
D. an
提示: "by + 交通工具"结构中不加冠词。

题目:
The old man often watches ______ TV in ______ evening.
A. the; the
B. /; the
C. the; /
D. /; /
提示: TV 前不加冠词；evening 前加 the。

题目:
______ sun sets in ______ west.
A. /; the
B. The; /
C. /; /
D. The; the
提示: 世界上独一无二的事物（sun）和方位（west）前均加 the。

题目:
My son goes to ______ school by ______ bike every day.
A. /; the
B. the; the
C. /; /
D. the; /
提示: "go to school"和"by bike"均为固定搭配，不加冠词。

题目:
There is ______ building over there. ______ building is our new library.
A. a; The
B. the; The
C. a; A
D. the; A
提示: 第一空泛指用 a，第二空特指用 the。

题目:
______ Mr. Wang is waiting for you outside the door.
A. The
B. One
C. A
D. An
提示: 泛指“一位王先生”，用不定冠词 a。

题目:
The boy and the girl are falling in love. They are nearly of ______ same age.
A. the
B. an
C. a
D. /
提示: 固定搭配"the same age"。

题目:
She was born on ______ May 8, 1992.
A. the
B. a
C. that
D. /
提示: 月份前不加冠词。

题目:
Many ______ old man wants to live with their children.
A. an
B. a
C. the
D. that
提示: "many a/an + 单数名词"结构，old 以元音音素开头。

题目:
There was an air crash last year. ______ living got 50,000 yuan compensation (赔偿金) per person.
A. The
B. A
C. /
D. That
提示: "the + 形容词"表示一类人（the living 指幸存者）。

题目:
______ Greens will go to Switzerland for a trip next month.
A. That
B. Which
C. The
D. A
提示: "the + 姓氏复数"表示一家人。

题目:
He graduated from college in ______ 1990's.
A. that
B. the
C. /
D. a
提示: 表示某个年代的复数名词前加 the。
